short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Stops websites from triggering popups & other unwanted interactions when you select text

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
For people who like to select text while reading â€” A chrome extension to shield you from websites that launch pop-ups or trigger "functionality" when text is selected.

The extension will prevent websites from getting selection information by default, if you wish to purposefully trigger an interaction, simply select text while holding down the command or ctrl key.
